```go
func main() {
	// 
	maxI := 10000000

	fmt.Println("1")

	// 
	rand.Seed(time.Now().UnixNano())

	echoString := ""

	for count := 0; count < 3; count++ {
		// 
		start := time.Now()
		echoString += "" + strconv.Itoa(count + 1) + ":"

		for i := 0; i < maxI; i++ {
			integer := rand.Intn(999)
			_, _ = strconv.Atoi(strconv.Itoa(integer) + "000")
		}

		// 
		end := time.Now()

		betweenTime := float64(end.Sub(start).Nanoseconds()) / 1000000000

		echoString += strconv.FormatFloat(betweenTime, 'f', 10, 64) + ""
	}

	fmt.Println(echoString)
	echoString = ""

	fmt.Println("21000")
	for count := 0; count < 3; count++ {
		// 
		start := time.Now()
		echoString += "" + strconv.Itoa(count + 1) + ":"

		for i := 0; i < maxI; i++ {
			integer := rand.Intn(999)
			_ = integer * 1000
		}

		// 
		end := time.Now()

		betweenTime := float64(end.Sub(start).Nanoseconds()) / 1000000000

		echoString += strconv.FormatFloat(betweenTime, 'f', 10, 64) + ""

	}

	fmt.Println(echoString)
	echoString = ""

	fmt.Println("31024")
	for count := 0; count < 3; count++ {
		// 
		start := time.Now()
		echoString += "" + strconv.Itoa(count + 1) + ":"

		for i := 0; i < maxI; i++ {
			integer := rand.Intn(999)
			_ = (integer * 1024) - (integer * 24)
		}

		// 
		end := time.Now()

		betweenTime := float64(end.Sub(start).Nanoseconds()) / 1000000000

		echoString += strconv.FormatFloat(betweenTime, 'f', 10, 64) + ""

	}

	fmt.Println(echoString)

}
```

Go ,`math/rand``crypto/rand`

## 

```go
func main() {
	for i:=0; i<10; i++ {
		fmt.Print(rand.Intn(10), " ")
	}
}
```

* : 1 7 7 9 1 8 5 0 6 0
* : 1 7 7 9 1 8 5 0 6 0
* ,,,

### 
```go
func Seed(seed int64)
```
* :

{% note info flat %}
Seed uses the provided seed value to initialize the default Source to a deterministic state. If Seed is not called, the generator behaves as if seeded by Seed(1). Seed values that have the same remainder when divided by 2^31-1 generate the same pseudo-random sequence. Seed, unlike the Rand.Seed method, is safe for concurrent use.
{% endnote %}

* 
* 
{% note info flat %}
Seedseedseed=1,,Seed.
,,,,
{% endnote %}

for i:=0; i<10; i++ {
	fmt.Print(rand.Intn(10), " ")
}
```

num := r.Intn(128)

package main
import (
    "crypto/rand"

    "math/big"
)
func main() {
    //  10  [0, 128) 
    for i := 0; i < 10; i++ {
        result, _ := rand.Int(rand.Reader, big.NewInt(128))
        fmt.Println(result)
    }
}
```

# MySQL
## 
root`select``update``delete``update``grant`

DBA

* 
* 
* 

##  MySQL 
```sql
mysql> use mysql
Database changed
```

## 

### 
```sql
CREATE USER "username"@"host" IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password BY "password";
```

eg:
```sql
-- ip47.99.161.35 curatorc 
CREATE USER "curatorc"@"47.99.161.35" IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password by "password";
-- ip47.99.161.  curatorc 
CREATE USER "curatorc"@"47.99.161.%" IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password by "password";
-- ip curatorc 
CREATE USER "curatorc"@"%" IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password by "password";
```

### 
```sql
DROP USER "username"@"host";
```
### 
```sql
RENAME USER "username"@"host" TO "newusn"@"host";
```

### 
```sql
ALTER USER 'username'@'host' IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password BY "password";
```

## 
### 
```sql
GRANT all privileges ON database.table TO "username"@"host";
```

eg:
```sql
--  curatorc db1.t1
GRANT select, insert, update ON db1.t1 TO "curatorc"@"%";

--  grant root curatorc db1t1
GRANT all privileges ON db1.t1 TO "curatorc"@"%";
--  curatorc db1
GRANT all privileges ON db1.* TO "curatorc"@"%";
--  curatorc 
GRANT all privileges ON *.* TO "curatorc"@"%";
```

### 
```sql
SHOW GRANTS FOR "username"@"host"
```

### 
```sql
REVOKE ALL ON database.table FROM "username"@"host";
```
## 
```sql
FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
```

## 
```sql
-- +
MYSQDUMP -u root db1 > db1.sql -p

-- 
MYSQDUMP -u root -d db1 > db1.sql -p

-- 
-- 1.
CREATE DATABASE db10;
-- 2.db10
MYSQDUMP -u root -d db10 < db1.sql -p
```

> [](https://www.cnblogs.com/wangyueping/p/11258028.html)

/etc/apt/sources.list.bak sed -i "s/archive.ubuntu.com/mirrors.aliyun.com/g" /etc/apt/sources.list sed -i '/^#/d' /etc/apt/sources.list apt update ``` ### PostgreSQL #### ```bash apt-get install postgresql ``` #### ```bash vim /etc/postgresql/12/main/pg_hba.conf ``` ``` host all all 127.0.0.1/32 md5 ``` `md5``trust``localhost` #### * postgres PostgreSQL ```bash sudo -i -u postgres ``` * ```bash createdb sentry ``` * {% note warning %} Sentry sentry {% endnote %} ```bash psql sentry ``` ### Redis ```bash apt-get install redis ``` ### virtualenv `virtualenv` `python` `virtualenv` #### ```bash pip3 install virtualenv ``` #### * ```bash mkdir /var/www ```` * ```bash cd /var/www virtualenv sentryEnv ``` * ```bash cd sentryEnv source bin/activate ``` * ```bash bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip ``` * {% note warning %} Python Sentry virtualenv {% endnote %} ```bash deactivate ``` ### Sentry #### libxml2-dev * ```bash apt-get update ``` * ```bash apt-get install libxml2-dev ``` #### libxmlsec1-dev * ubuntu 20.04 libxmlsec1-dev apt-get `aptitude` ```bash apt-get install aptitude ``` * {% note warning flat %} `aptitude` 1 `libxmlsec1-dev` Y/n/... n Y {% endnote %} ```bash aptitude install libxmlsec1-dev ``` #### libxmlsec1-openssl ```bash apt-get install libxmlsec1-openssl ``` #### pkg-config ```bash apt-get install pkg-config ``` ### Sentry #### ```bash pip install -U sentry ``` #### BUG * Python 21.6.3 Sentry ```bash vim /var/www/sentryEnv/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dataclasses.py ``` * ```vim /typing._ClassVar ``` * `i``typing.ClassVar` #### ```bash sentry init sentry upgrade ``` ### supervisor #### ```bash pip install supervisor ``` #### ```bash vim /etc/supervisor/conf.d/sentry.conf ``` ```vim [program:sentry-web] directory=/usr/local/lib/python3.8/dist-packages/sentry/ environment=SENTRY_CONF="~/.sentry" command=sentry run web autostart=true autorestart=true redirect_stderr=true stdout_logfile=/var/log/sentry/sentry-web.log stderr_logfile=/var/log/sentry/sentry-web.log [program:sentry-worker] directory=/usr/local/lib/python3.8/dist-packages/sentry/ environment=SENTRY_CONF="~/.sentry" command=sentry run worker autostart=true autorestart=true redirect_stderr=true stdout_logfile=/var/log/sentry/sentry-worker.log stderr_logfile=/var/log/sentry/sentry-worker.log [program:sentry-cron] directory=/usr/local/lib/python3.8/dist-packages/sentry/ environment=SENTRY_CONF="~/.sentry" command=sentry run cron autostart=true autorestart=true redirect_stderr=true stdout_logfile=/var/log/sentry/sentry-cron.log stderr_logfile=/var/log/sentry/sentry-cron.log ``` #### ```bash # supervisorctl status # all supervisorctl stop all # all supervisorctl start all # supervisorctl restart # supervisorctl update # supervisorctl reload ```

Post.title: Ubuntu  LNMP
Post.keywords: Ubuntu, LNMP, PHP, MySQL, Redis, Nginx
Post._content:
# Ubuntu 20.04  lnmp 

##  root 

 root 

```bash
sudo su
```

## 

``` shell
lsb_release -a
```

##  apt 

### 

```bash
cp /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.bak
```

### 

```bash
sed -i "s/archive.ubuntu.com/mirrors.aliyun.com/g" /etc/apt/sources.list
```

### #

```bash
sed -i '/^#/d' /etc/apt/sources.list
```

###  PHP 

```bash
apt install lsb-release ca-certificates apt-transport-https -y
add-apt-repository ppa:ondrej/php
```

###  apt 

```bash
apt update
```

## MySQL 8.0

Ubuntu 20.04  mysql8.0 apt 

```bash
apt-get install mysql-server
```

### MySQL

* 
```bash
service mysql status
```

* 
```bash
service mysql start
```

* 
```bash
service mysql stop
```

* 
```bash
service mysql restart
```

### MySQL

 MySQL 

 MySQL Ubuntu20.04 



```bash
cat /etc/mysql/debian.cnf
```



```bash
mysql -u debian-sys-maint -p
```

###  root  

```sql
ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password BY "password";
```

{% note info flat%}
[](/mysql/CreateUserAndAuthorization)
{% endnote %}

## PHP

###  PHP

```bash
apt install php8.0
```

 PHP  `php -v`

### PHP 

```bash
apt install php8.0-mbstring php8.0-sqlite3 php8.0-redis php8.0-gd php8.0-fpm php8.0-curl php8.0-xml php8.0-mysql
```

## Composer

### 

```bash
cd /usr/src
```

### 

```bash
php -r "copy('https://install.phpcomposer.com/installer', 'composer-setup.php');"
```

### 

```bash
php composer-setup.php
```

### 

```bash
php -r "unlink('composer-setup.php');"
```

### 

```bash
mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer
```

###  Composer 

```bash
composer --version
```

### 

```bash
composer config -g repo.packagist composer https://mirrors.aliyun.com/composer/
```

## Nginx

### 

Nginx  Ubuntu 

```bash
apt install nginx
```

### 

```bash
systemctl status nginx
```

`System has not been booted with systemd as init system (PID 1). Can't operate.` `SysV init`  `systemctl status service_name`  `service service_name status` .

```bash
service nginx status
```

###
